title: Median 2015 - 2017
description:
The data being visualised here is the median house price in England and Wales between 2015 and 2017. The height of each pixel represents the median price for properties sold in that area

The house price data was taken from https://data.gov.uk/dataset/price-paid-data. For more information, the source code that created this dataset is here https://github.com/jamesHargreaves12/DataVis_python.
